name: FEditableTextBoxStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an SEditableTextBox

BackgroundImageNormal: Border background image when the box is not hovered or focused
BackgroundImageHovered: Border background image when the box is hovered
BackgroundImageFocused: Border background image when the box is focused
BackgroundImageReadOnly: Border background image when the box is read-only
TextStyle: The style of the text block, which dictates the font, color, and shadow options. Style overrides all other properties!
BackgroundColor: The background color applied to the active background image
ReadOnlyForegroundColor: The read-only foreground color of text in read-only mode.
FocusedForegroundColor: The foreground color of text when the edit box has keyboard focus.
